name: joyful in unity
description: Tolerance is the key to differences, humans have unique characteristics and all are different, this often creates hostility and destroys peace. Moderation is not just a religious guide, but a humanitarian guide. The crisis of difference has become a gap between humans and even divided the nation, at this moment it feels right to talk about unity, this topic is always discussed in the country where I am, there are people who always try to divide unity with political, religious, racial and ideological issues. One beautiful thing that was imagined in making this painting, I imagined the intimacy of unity in joy, new hope every year to be friends with God's best creation "humans"
